languages.text: "Какие удивительно мягкие слова после всего, что мы видели. Так порядок не наведешь. Настало время суровых и решительных мер, или ваши подданные и союзники так и продолжат восставать против вас".

"Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."
languages.original_text: "Какие удивительно мягкие слова после всего, что мы видели. Так порядок не наведешь. Настало время суровых и решительных мер, или ваши подданные и союзники так и продолжат восставать против вас".

traits.locale_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

"Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

"Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

"Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

"Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

languages.text: "Überraschend versöhnliche Worte, nach allem, was wir gesehen haben. So werdet Ihr die Ordnung nicht wiederherstellen. Es wird Zeit für harte und entschlossene Maßnahmen. Andernfalls werden Eure Untertanen und Verbündeten weiter gegen Euch rebellieren."
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: "Überraschend versöhnliche Worte, nach allem, was wir gesehen haben. So werdet Ihr die Ordnung nicht wiederherstellen. Es wird Zeit für harte und entschlossene Maßnahmen. Andernfalls werden Eure Untertanen und Verbündeten weiter gegen Euch rebellieren."

languages.text: « Une déclaration étonnamment mesurée après tout ce que nous avons vu. Vous ne rétablirez pas l'ordre ainsi. L'heure est aux décisions fermes et définitives, ou vos sujets et vos alliés continueront à se soulever contre vous. »
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: « Une déclaration étonnamment mesurée après tout ce que nous avons vu. Vous ne rétablirez pas l'ordre ainsi. L'heure est aux décisions fermes et définitives, ou vos sujets et vos alliés continueront à se soulever contre vous. »

languages.text: “我们见证了这么多事情，而你现在的态度依然这么温和，这样是无法恢复秩序的。如今，采取雷霆手段的时刻到了，否则你的臣民与盟友将会继续反对你。”
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: “我们见证了这么多事情，而你现在的态度依然这么温和，这样是无法恢复秩序的。如今，采取雷霆手段的时刻到了，否则你的臣民与盟友将会继续反对你。”

languages.text: «Unas palabras sorprendentemente moderadas, después de todo lo que hemos visto. Así no conseguirá restaurar el orden. Es el momento de tomar medidas duras y decisivas. Si no, sus súbditos y aliados seguirán rebelándose contra usted».
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: «Unas palabras sorprendentemente moderadas, después de todo lo que hemos visto. Así no conseguirá restaurar el orden. Es el momento de tomar medidas duras y decisivas. Si no, sus súbditos y aliados seguirán rebelándose contra usted».

languages.text: 「これまで見てきたことを考えれば、驚くほど穏やかなお言葉ですね。そんなやり方で秩序は取り戻せません。今こそ厳しく断固たる措置を取る時です。さもなければ、あなたの臣民や同盟者たちは反抗を続けるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: 「これまで見てきたことを考えれば、驚くほど穏やかなお言葉ですね。そんなやり方で秩序は取り戻せません。今こそ厳しく断固たる措置を取る時です。さもなければ、あなたの臣民や同盟者たちは反抗を続けるでしょう」

languages.text: "Gördüğümüz onca şeyin ardından şaşırtıcı derecede ılımlı laflar ettiniz. Bu şekilde adaleti tecelli ettiremezsiniz. Zaman, katı ve kesin önlemler alma zamanıdır. Yoksa isyan eden tebaanın da müttefiklerin de sonu gelmez."
languages.original_text: "Surprisingly moderate words after all we have seen. You will not restore order this way. Now is the time for harsh and decisive measures, or else your subjects and allies will continue to rebel against you."

traits.locale_text: "Gördüğümüz onca şeyin ardından şaşırtıcı derecede ılımlı laflar ettiniz. Bu şekilde adaleti tecelli ettiremezsiniz. Zaman, katı ve kesin önlemler alma zamanıdır. Yoksa isyan eden tebaanın da müttefiklerin de sonu gelmez."
